ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard hunt places - spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You get the observers staff by killing a named evil eye - Broxx in the Gorge. It s about level 30 and it gives a lens. You bring the lens to the observer
ygData.messageBody:
Wizard wrote:

> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> 8.) Runny eye clan is where you can find a nice black iron medalion and
> also a place where you can get something for a observer staff quest eheheeh
> lv 24 and more
>

You get the observers staff by killing a named evil eye - Broxx in the Gorge. It's
about level 30 and it gives a lens. You bring the lens to the observer at
steamfront and he gives you the staff.

>
> Any other places what you know about im looking for a batskull earings +5
> int and also sacrifical dagger +5 int and a evil eye necklace place +9 int
> +5 stamina ac 3 _
>

You get the sacrificial dagger in mistmoore.


--
Sergey
--
KPS PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
